ISSUE.TITLE: Download Dataset does not work when not logged in
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary Using a query public URL, trying to download the dataset as a CSV when not logged in fails ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Create a query that returns a table 2. Create a public link using "embed" (use the src argument) 3. Open the link from an **anonymous** browser window 4. Click Download Dataset CSV Getting ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/106487/17824986/fee1e108-6619-11e6-9f55-4e3c99a8f633.png) ### Technical details: - Redash Version: 0.11.1+b2095 - Browser/OS: Chrome / Mac

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1113 from whummer/feat/share-access-permissions Add: share modify/access permissions for queries and dashboard
